description:
View version of SpeakerOutputChannel with preset locking support and 1-indexed EQ bands.

Converts all processing layers to use view types with 1-indexed EQ bands. PresetProcessingView additionally handles vendor-locked presets (returns None for locked fields).

array.description: Array processing layer with 5-band EQ (1-indexed bands)

preset.description: Preset processing layer with 15-band EQ (1-indexed bands) and locking support

user.description: User processing layer with 10-band EQ (1-indexed bands)

title: SpeakerOutputChannelView
